p:
Three-week-old female Syrian Golden hamsters were inoculated intra-peritoneally with 5×10 5 TCID50 of virus in a final volume of 100 μL HBSS. In all experiments, a control group of two hamsters was kept uninfected. The clinical course of the viral infection was monitored by following (1) the clinical manifestation of the disease (brittle fur, dehydration, prostration, and lethargy), (2) weight evolution, and (3) death.
